SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.splendorserver.control

Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorserver.control.ActionManager
@RestController public class ActionManager extends Object
Manages the move discovery, selection, and propagation of moves made by specific players in specific game sessions. Singleton by default.
Author:
Zachary Hayden

  • Method Details

    • performAction

      @PostMapping("/api/games/{gameid}/players/{player}/actions/{actionMD5}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> performAction(@PathVariable(name="gameid") long gameid, @PathVariable(name="player") String playerName, @PathVariable(name="actionMD5") String actionMd5, @RequestParam(name="access_token") String accessToken)
      Sends a message to the server to perform the given action.
      Parameters:
      gameid - The game id of the game being played
      playerName - The name of the current player
      actionMd5 - The given action, written as a String
      accessToken - The access token
      Returns:
      If there is a pending action it indicates, otherwise it indicates the next player up.

    • getAvailableActions

      @GetMapping(value="/api/games/{gameid}/players/{player}/actions", produces="application/json; charset=utf-8") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity getAvailableActions(@PathVariable(name="gameid") long gameid, @PathVariable(name="player") String playerName, @RequestParam(name="access_token") String accessToken)
      Method to discover and retrieve all the possible moves for the specific player in specific game session.
      Parameters:
      gameid - game ID of the game being played
      playerName - player whose turn it currently is
      Returns:
      the possible moves that can be made in a map (key, value) = (hash, raw move objec)
